title.en: Renormalization Methods in Quantum Field Theory

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: Renormalization theory has its origin in solid state physics where it helped to generalize relations holding on the crystall lattice in order to say something about critical phenomenons, as they occur in phase transitions. The critical exponents in solid state physics correspond to anomalous dimensions of parameters in quantum field theory. In addition, renormalization helps to handle singularities occuring in loop integrals in an appropriate manner. In this lecture series we get acquainted with regularization and subtraction and deal with the renormalization of Quantum Electrodynamics, Quantum Chromodynamics and the elektroweak theory. In addition, we consider general concepts on the renormalization group and the running of parameters.
description.et: Renormeerimisteooria tuli esialgselt tahkiste füüsikast, kus aitas kristallvõres kehtivaid seoseid üldistada täiskehale, üteldes midagi kriitiliste ilmingute nagu faasiüleminekute kohta. Mis seal on kriitilised eksponendid, on kvantväljateoorias parameetrite anomaalsed dimensioonid, ja renormeerimine aitab siin korralikult käituda silmuseintegraalides ilmuvate singulaarsustega. Loengukursuses saame regulariseerimise ja lahutamisega tuttavaks ja tegeleme kvantelektrodünaamika, kvantkromodünaamika ja elektronõrga teooria renormeerimisega ning renormeerimisrühma ja parameetrite jooksu mõistega.

objectives.en: The aim of this course is to introduce methods for removing singularities which appear in perturbative calculations.
objectives.et: Õppeaine eesmärgiks on tutvustada meetoditega, mis võimaldavad eemaldada häiritusarvutuses ilmuvaid singulaarsusi.

learning_outcomes.en: 1. knows to rate the possibilities to renormalize different theories.
2. is able to fix the occuring singularities via regularisation.
learning_outcomes.et: 2. oskab regulariseerimise kaudu kinni määrata ilmuvaid singulaarsusi.

learning_outcomes.en: 3. knows about different methods to subtract the divergences.
4. knows how to finally eliminate the divergences.
learning_outcomes.et: 4. teab, kuidas hajuvusi saab lõpuks eemaldada.
